allow:
Bash(.gitignore << 'EOF'
# Rust
/target/
**/*.rs.bk
*.pdb
Cargo.lock

# Environment variables \(ВАЖЛИВО!\)
.env

# Wallets file \(ПРИВАТНІ КЛЮЧІ!\)
wallets.xlsx
wallets.csv

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log
EOF)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: SOLdrip automation bot

- Wallet generation with ed25519 keys
- Auto-connect to soldrip.io
- Auto-claim with 2Captcha integration
- Excel \(XLSX\) storage for wallets
- Parallel processing ready
- 1000 wallets support

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix reCAPTCHA v2 integration for soldrip.io

- Changed from reCAPTCHA v3 to v2 \(removed version/action/min_score params\)
- Updated site key to real soldrip.io key: 6LeYdFcsAAAAACXSB7EiVlXm6Wp2F1bkESWKnhkg
- Added detailed logging for captcha token and site key
- Fixed "Invalid captcha" error - now working correctly

Tested: Manual claim successful, automatic captcha solving works

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
